attributes.action: Uk to rewards frontline immigrant workers with citizenship
attributes.background: Frontline workers around the world have been exposed to Covid-19 at a high rate with many dying from the disease including doctors and nurses and healthcare workers it would be good to be rewarded British citizenship to feel appreciated and recognition of their "great services rendered".

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565011
